news_header: Errors in credit reports have led to inflated income figures due to ignored reductions.
news_text: Mistakes in credit reports have resulted in some individuals having inaccurately high net and gross income figures, as reductions were overlooked in income calculations. These inaccuracies stem from data transfer errors and have persisted since the register's inception. The Registry has identified the number of customers affected by incorrect income information, and the error is now being corrected.
